messages.message: First name is being picked up as last name, and last name is being picked up as first name. Any idea why?

I guess Raul is a common first name in Spanish and this is likely a generated doc, so that must be a factor. And Escamilla is mostly a surname. I'm interested to see how this behaves with names like Smith that could be both first and last names?
you could try to create a “Name” field to get “Escamilla Trejo Raul” and then create derived fields or custom function fields for “Legal first name” and “Legal last name”?
Yeah that’s the plan for now. Seems to be most reliable
we’ve heard of SEs using a similar approach for name / first name / last name when we were designing derived fields / custom function fields
